services.title: Dance Lessons
services.hoverText:
Whether you're flying solo or stepping out with a partner, our instructors meet you where you are.

Move at your pace from social foundation through gold and open—Waltz, Cha Cha, Hustle, and beyond. Your journey, your style.

services.title: Wedding Dances
services.hoverText:
Your first dance should feel like yours.

We design a wedding dance that fits your song, your story, and your comfort level—from a simple sway to full choreography. Private lessons and packages tailored to your big day.

services.title: Tap Dance
services.hoverText:
Find your rhythm from the ground up. Our tap program welcomes beginners and intermediates alike—learn technique, timing, and style in a supportive setting.

Private and group options available.

services.title: Competitions
services.hoverText:
Ready to take the floor? Train with our coaches and compete at events throughout the year.

We'll help you polish technique, build routines, and step onto the podium with confidence.

services.title: Country Line Dance
services.hoverText:
No partner required—just bring your boots and your energy.

Our country line dance classes get everyone moving together. Learn classic and current line dances in a fun, social atmosphere.

services.title: Themed Parties
services.hoverText:
Join us for fun social events hosted regularly by Classic Ballroom!

From holidays, to parties and special events, we have something for everyone.

services.title: Classic Kids
services.hoverText:
Ages 5–17: start here with our beginner-friendly group class, then grow with us.

Kids can add private lessons, group classes, competitions, and showcases whenever they're ready. Dance becomes a lifelong adventure.

services.title: Social Events
services.hoverText:
Dance isn't just lessons—it's community. Join us for holidays, parties, and special events throughout the year.

No experience needed; just show up, meet other dancers, and have a great time.

services.title: Showcases
services.hoverText:
Take the spotlight in our spring and fall showcases.

Work with us on learning choreography, technique, and stage presence—then perform for family and friends. A milestone you'll remember.

services.title: Group Classes
services.hoverText:
Drop in almost any day: ballroom and Latin technique, tap, country line dance, and more.

Learn in a group, make friends, and build skills at a fraction of the cost. Check the calendar and find your class.
